about_the_game:
Greetings Warriors!

We are excited to bring you the next demo version of Royal Revolt Warriors! With a ton of new content, we can't wait for you to dive in and experience the latest updates. Your feedback remains crucial to us and we would love to hear your thoughts as you explore the new version.

New Features to Explore

  • Multiplayer Madness!

    • We’ve enabled experimental 2-4 player online multiplayer via Steam Netplay!

    • Play with friends locally, online, or even mix and match both.

New Warrior, Weapons, Enchantments & Trinkets

  • Meet your new ally: Moe the Monk

  • Multiple new Warrior abilities

  • New weapons and enchantments

  • New trinkets and improvements

Available Multiplayer Modes

  • Online Co-op: Join forces with 1-4 players online and battle the dark forces together.

  • Couch Co-op: Enjoy the adventure side-by-side in 1-4 player couch co-op mode!

Please help us out and and test our new online co-op now! Your feedback will help us bugfix and fine-tune multiplayer for the full release. Join the Royal Revolt Warriors community, team up with friends, and conquer the madness together!

name: Royal Revolt Warriors Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Win 10
  • Processor: Intel i5-4590 or similar
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce GTX 1050 or similar
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Welcome to the Royal Revolt Warriors demo! Explore the Royal Forest, arm yourself with unique weapons and lead powerful Warriors into battle. Experience exciting 1-4 player online or couch co-op and increase your power by unlocking meta upgrades.
supported_languages:
English*, German, French, Italian, Spanish - Spain
*languages with full audio support
